product_name: AMC Maine Mountains Trail Map - Baxter State Park - Katahdin - 100-Mile Wilderness
long_description: This Appalachian Mountain Club trail map lets you explore Maine's Baxter State Park, Katahdin and 100-Mile Wilderness armed with the latest information packed into a waterproof package.
short_description: This Appalachian Mountain Club trail map lets you explore Maine's Baxter State Park, Katahdin and 100-Mile Wilderness armed with the latest information packed into a waterproof package.
